about_the_game:
Terminal Adventure is an instance based card battler. Build decks to take on quest and progress your adventurer rank. Take your deck online and battle your friends!

Content
Adventure mode
Begin your adventure in the guild hall. Pick out quests from the quest board to take on other premade decks in a 1v1 PvE deck battle.
Acquire money and cards from the quests to build your deck.

Card Shop
Using the gold you earn from completing quests, buy cards from the shop that can be added to your deck.

Deck building
Go to the open table in the guild hall to edit your deck. Using the cards you gain from quests and the shop, create a deck you feel will bring you victory. Make multiple decks you can choose between.

Karma
Taking quests of certain alignment will grace you with positive or negative karma. Watch your guild hall transform as you delve deeper into your preferred alignment.

Multiplayer
Battle your friends online with the decks you made from adventure mode through steam's servers or LAN connection.

Minimum:
  • OS: Sequoia
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Might see frame drops with lower specs. However, game does not require high fps to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 7 3700
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A fantasy deck builder. Acquire new cards through quests to build your perfect party. Choose your alignment through action. Battle your friends online. Become the strongest adventurer guild around.
